• Dragons of Tarkir Mobile Spoiler

Gleam of Authority
1W
Enchantment - Aura
R

Enchant creature

Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each +1/+1 counter on other creatures you control.

Enchanted creature has vigilance and "W, T: Bolster 1". (To bolster 1, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
